Test Name: GAMMA-AMINO BUTYRIC ACID TYPE A (GABA-A) Receptor Antibody, Cell-Binding Assay
Purpose: To detect and quantify GABA-A receptor antibodies in serum for clinical assessment of autoimmune or neurological disorders.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or red-top tube
Equipment: GABA-A receptor cell-binding assay kit, incubators, centrifuge, calibrated pipettes, microplate reader
